description: Number of labeled connected graphs with n nodes such that complement is also connected.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..50
V. A. Liskovets, Some easily derivable sequences, J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #00.2.2.
maple: b:= n-> 2^(n*(n-1)/2):g:= proc(n) option remember; local k; `if`(n=0, 1,      b(n)- add(k*binomial(n,k) *b(n-k)*g(k), k=1..n-1)/n)    end:a:= n-> 2*g(n)-b(n):seq (a(n), n=1..20);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 21 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 23 2000
